Articles.Content:
Hello everybody. My name is Dr. K Kerbal. I only started this account today and I am really enthusiastic about KSP. I am really good at making close versions to NASA's real craft such as the Saturn V rocket, the SLS, space shuttle and much more. 

I realy enjoy people liking me and love giving out information and solving troubleshooting. I really like reviewing mods and cant wait to get a few subscribers to my account!

Welcome aboard, Dr. K!

I took the liberty of removing your duplicate thread and moving this one to our "Welcome Aboard" section, seeing as this thread is more of an introduction rather than an Add-On discussion.

Ok. 

As I am only new to this website, I would like to ask a few questions.

1.) hen I look at your information, you currently have 1191 points. What are points?

2.) How can I get my rank up from bottle rocketeer? 

3.)What are the little dots on your account?

If thee questions were answered they would be greatly appreciated! 

P.S. I love the little Kerbal emoji!!!

1) I think you slipped a digit and misread the word, it's 11591 posts (I post altogether too much).

2) It's related to post count. You can also change it to something of your own choosing in your profile settings, as I have.

3) Not sure about that one.

Cool! Thanks!

How do you upload a craft file onto KSP?

If you mean download someone else's craft into your KSP, just save the .craft file in ksp/Saves/$SaveName/Ships/VAB or /SPH (I think, going from memory here).

If you mean upload one of your ships for others to use, try http://kerbalx.com/

1 hour ago, Dr.K Kerbal said:

Ok. 

As I am only new to this website, I would like to ask a few questions.

1.) hen I look at your information, you currently have 1191 points. What are points?

2.) How can I get my rank up from bottle rocketeer? 

3.)What are the little dots on your account?

If thee questions were answered they would be greatly appreciated! 

P.S. I love the little Kerbal emoji!!!  

2.) You can also change that manually, by going to your profile and clicking "Edit profile" in the upper-right corner, then changing the "Member Title" field.  As you can see, my title is "SCIIENNCCCEEEEEEE!!!!!!!"

3.) I think the dots are related (again) to post count.

Thanks!

40 minutes ago, Red Iron Crown said:

If you mean download someone else's craft into your KSP, just save the .craft file in ksp/Saves/$SaveName/Ships/VAB or /SPH (I think, going from memory here).

If you mean upload one of your ships for others to use, try http://kerbalx.com/ 

I actully meant one of your own craft.

OH WHOOPS! I cinda misread. You did metion one of your own craft! Thanks soooooo much!
